pt: {sc}discernment{/sc} {sc}discrimination{/sc} {sc}perception{/sc} {sc}penetration{/sc} {sc}insight{/sc} {sc}acumen{/sc} mean a power to see what is not evident to the average mind. {sc}discernment{/sc} stresses accuracy (as in reading character or motives or appreciating art).
{sc}discrimination{/sc} stresses the power to distinguish and select what is true or appropriate or excellent.

pt.t: the {it}discrimination{/it} that develops through listening to a lot of great music

pt: {sc}perception{/sc} implies quick and often sympathetic discernment (as of shades of feeling).

pt.t: a novelist of keen {it}perception{/it} into human motives

pt: {sc}penetration{/sc} implies a searching mind that goes beyond what is obvious or superficial.

pt.t: lacks the {it}penetration{/it} to see the scorn beneath their friendly smiles

pt: {sc}insight{/sc} suggests depth of discernment coupled with understanding sympathy.

pt.t: a documentary providing {it}insight{/it} into the plight of the homeless

pt: {sc}acumen{/sc} implies characteristic penetration combined with keen practical judgment.
